text: Ne Omundu nanyoola amasila kosikosi asaba Nyasaye wuwe namukalushila, ne namuhelesia tsimbabaasi okhurula ewuwe yebilila akayasabanga imbeli mana natsokasia Nyasaye nende Abanyasaye bandi mbu kho akosie Abandu khu injila yiye, wikhoye nende obukhayi bubwo hatiti, toto ewe oli mubaandu bomumulilo
